description:

🍿WATCH FULL EP 132 ON BITCHUTE🍿
.
🍿LINK IN BIO🍿
.
Last week, a viral video was circulating of business owner and veteran, Carlos Zapata (@carlos.zapata.90), speaking to the Shasta County City Council.  During his speech, he described the growing aggravation amongst citizens regarding the closing businesses, foreclosed homes and psychological impacts on children.  He mentioned that obedient citizens will become revolutionary citizens very soon if the cities don’t open back up.  A powerful statement sparked a powerful conversation in episode 132 (available on BitChute - link in bio)
.
.
